AUCTION GOSSIP GRATS NOAUCTION NOGOSSIP NOGRATS
Usage: auction <message> gossip <message> grats <message>
These are channels reserved for specific purposes. Messages on these channels reach everyone who is monitoring them. You must be at least level three to use these channels.
Examples:
> auction short sword -- minimum bid 100k > gossip Hey, is that a short sword on your belt or are you happy to see me? > grats LEVEL!!!!!!!! > grats GRATS CATJE!!!!!!!!
See also: EMOTE, GSAY, HOLLER, NOREPEAT, SAY, SHOUT
